metadata.title: USN-4598-1 -- LibEtPan vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that LibEtPan incorrectly handled STARTTLS when using IMAP, SMTP and POP3. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform a response injection attack. (CVE-2020-15953)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4598-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libetpan-dev - 1.6-1ubuntu0.1 libetpan-doc - 1.6-1ubuntu0.1 libetpan17 - 1.6-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
